ParameterFields.Name: At Point 1 Switch
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
The lift will use this switch to remember which end of the pulley rope it was last left on.
It will start at point 0. When the player leaves the room, it will set this switch if it's at point 1, or unset it if it's at point 0.
If this switch is 255 or 0, it will be ignored and not set/unset, the lift will always start at point 0.
